ChronoCure was incorporated in 2007 by Alistair Finch and Margo Vance following the complete and unauthorized erasure of Vance's vintage clothing enterprise by MegaMart Holdings LLC, a company that no longer admits this happened. We provide temporal dislocation services to corporate entities seeking to relocate unfavorable public events to decades where they will be absorbed, contextualized, and eventually forgotten. We do not destroy information. We re-shelve it.

"This is the version legal approved. The real one is in the Betamax vault. —M"

Our clients include three Fortune 500 companies who will deny this under oath, a mid-tier pharmaceutical firm whose 2019 internal memo about "acceptable casualty thresholds" now lives inside a 1963 space-race recruitment brochure, and at least one unnamed federal agency that paid in cash and communicated exclusively by fax.

Our methods are proprietary. Our ethics are negotiable but not absent. We operate under the principle that history is already being rewritten by people with worse taste and no budget. ChronoCure simply provides the aesthetic coherence that forgetting deserves.

"Finch wanted 'we bury your shame' as the tagline. I said no. He's still mad. —M"

Temporal dislocation is not erasure. It is a lateral filing maneuver. The incident still exists. It simply exists in 1974, where nobody is looking. Our anachronism specialists can relocate any public-facing scandal to a decade where it will be contextualized into meaninglessness within six fiscal quarters. This is not a crime. This is archival science with a billing department.
